mainEntity.name: What are the fee refund rules of Amity University, Noida?

acceptedAnswer.text: In Amity University Noida, Application for withdrawal from the course is to be submitted through Amizone. The college not accepts other mode of request. Given below are AUUP refund Guidelines for withdrawal of application: Application withdraws with in 15 days before the academic session starts, candidates will receive a 100% refund of the semester fees and security deposit, with a deduction of processing charge of up to 5% of the fees (maximum Rs. 5000.00). Application withdraws with less than 15 days before the academic session begins, candidates will receive a 90% refund of the semester fees and the Security Deposit. If a student withdraws within 15 days of the academic session starting, they'll get an 80% refund of the semester fees and the Security Deposit. Application withdraws 16-30 days after the academic session begins, candidates receive a 50% refund of semester fees and the Security Deposit. If they withdraw after 30 days, candidates only receive a refund of the Security Deposit.

mainEntity.name: What is the hostel withdrawal refund guidelines at Amity University, Noida?

acceptedAnswer.text: To withdrawal the application from the hostel, candidates are required to submit their request through Amizone. Hostel fee once paid will not be refunded in case of withdrawal at any point of time. Further, The Security deposits will be refunded after adjustment / clearance of dues, if any like the following : Alumni Life Member Fee @1000/- (Compulsory) IT Damage Charges Admin Damage Charges Central Library Charges Academics (Lab, Department Library/book bank, CRC, etc.) Examination Dues ID Card Charges Rs. 500/- (If not returned) Any other dues (Gate pass Charges/Duplicate ID Card etc.)
